title: Smart room and Mobile APPlication Development Suite for hospitality
objective:
SMAPP is an IT hospitality platform that integrates a smart room solution and a mobile application development suite, helping hotels to offer a 360∫ experience to their guests, increasing repeat customers while decreasing management costs by 18%. 
Luxury, boutique hotels, upper-scale accommodation providers and resorts strive to provide 360∫ experiences to their guests by improving the quality of service while reducing costs. The SMAPP system overcomes these challenges with two critical services: a custom mobile guide and a comfortable smart room experience. SMAPP includes the following components: 
- A Mobile Application Development suite and Content Management System for hotels. 
- A native mobile application for Android, iOS and Microsoft platforms for travelers. 
- A mesh wireless room to control devices such as lighting, heating, humidity actuators and sensors based on the Z-Wave technology. 
- A web management console which provides hotel owners with a Hotel Management System and an interface to room's devices. 
- Room controllers acting as interfaces between the management system and roomís devices. 
SMAPP is a disrupting solution promoted by an established luxury accommodation provider, DELTAFIN21, in collaboration with ZUNA, a promising hospitality technology provider. The solution, which is already backed by important electrical engineering companies as well as hospitality providers, will be demonstrated in 4 pilot projects throughout Europe. In Phase 1 we will analyse installation requirements, select the pilot hotels and technological partners and define the business plan and Intellectual Property strategy.
